fig.show()

source.2273b171:
I think files which are useful for EDA are
1. Patient_Profile.csv
* Patient_ID - Unique Identifier for each patient. * Online_Follower - Whether a patient follows MedCamp online or not * Linkedin_Shared - Whether the patient has shared details of a camp on his LinkedIn id * Twitter_Shared - Whether the patient has tweeted about the health camp * Facebook_Shared - Whether the patient has shared an update about the health camp * Income - Income of the patient * Education_Score - Score about education of the patient. Higher would mean better * Age - Age of the patient (as captured at time of registration) * First_Interaction - Date of first interaction * City_Type - Category of the city * Employer_Category - Category of the employer 2. Health_Camp_Detail.csv
* Health_Camp_ID - Unique Identifier for each camp. * Camp_Start_Date - Start Date of the Health Camp * Camp_End_Date - End Date of the Health Camp * Category1 - Category segmentation of the Health Camp - 1 * Category2 - Category segmentation of the Health Camp - 2 * Category3 - Category segmentation of the Health Camp - 3 3. First_Health_Camp_Attend.csv
* Patient_ID - Unique Identifier for each patient. * Health_Camp_ID - Unique Identifier for each camp * Donation - Amount of donation received at the camp * Health_Score - Amount of donation received at the camp 4. Second_Health_Camp_Attend * Patient_ID - Unique Identifier for each patient. * Health_Camp_ID - Unique Identifier for each camp. * Health_Score - Amount of donation received at the camp 5. Third_Health_Camp_Attend * Patient_ID - Unique Identifier for each patient. * Health_Camp_ID - Unique Identifier for each camp. * Number_of_stall_visited - Number of stalls visited at the camp. * Last_Stall_Visited_Number -

Along with this, train and test files

source.c74991ac:
* File Patient_Profile has predominantly has Null values or None
* Employer_Category has mostly None, but other than that, graph is right skewed. Most of the scores are in range 70 to 90
* Same with Age column, Mostly None value. Intresting point is of Age range, huge number of patient are in range 35 to around 50, there is very few number of patient in age range of 55 to 70 and sharp increase from age 70 to 78
source.abbf0056: Mean health score has increased from first to second visit

source.0e2b1b11:

Mean age is almost same for all years, over the year people with wide age range visit the camp
